price: Mpaka watapo funguliwa Juju na Maajuju wakawa wanateremka kutoka kila mlima;
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُتِحَتۡ يَأۡجُوجُ وَمَأۡجُوجُ وَهُم مِّن كُلِّ حَدَبٖ يَنسِلُونَ
footnotes: Mpaka itapo funguliwa milango ya shari na ufisadi, wakaingia wana wa Juju na Maajuju wakikimbizana kuteremka milimani na majiani kwa kufanya vitendo vya fujo na rabsha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā futiḥat yajūju wamajūju wahum min kulli ḥadabin yansilūna
